sections.title: Why build your own order tracking & visibility tool?
sections.content:
In today's fast-paced world, customers expect real-time updates and businesses need full transparency over their supply chain. Generic, off-the-shelf tracking solutions often fall short, failing to integrate with your unique systems or provide the level of detail you truly need.

Building a custom order tracking and visibility tool with Kliv allows you to precisely match your operational needs, integrate seamlessly with all your existing platforms, and provide an unparalleled customer experience. Stop adapting your business to software and start building software that adapts to your business.

sections.title: The case for custom order visibility
sections.content:
## The limitations of generic tracking solutions

Many businesses rely on third-party carrier portals or basic e-commerce tracking plugins, which often lead to:

- **Limited information**: Customers often only see basic shipping updates, not preparation or fulfillment stages.
- **Integration headaches**: Difficulty connecting with your specific ERP, WMS, or CRM systems.
- **Lack of brand control**: A fragmented customer experience when they leave your site to track an order.
- **High inquiry volume**: Customers still call or email asking "Where's my order?" due to insufficient information.
- **Operational blind spots**: Internal teams lack a unified view of orders across disparate systems.

## Why custom-built is superior

Leveraging AI-powered platforms like Kliv, building a tailor-made order tracking solution is now accessible and highly advantageous:

### End-to-end transparency
From order placement to delivery, track every single step‚Äîproduction, picking, packing, shipping, and delivery‚Äîall within a single, unified view. Provide your customers and internal teams with complete clarity.

### Seamless integration
Connect directly to your internal systems (inventory management, CRM, ERP, shipping carriers, payment gateways) ensuring all data is synchronized and accurate. No more manual data entry or data silos.

### Enhanced customer experience
Offer a branded, real-time tracking portal or automated notifications directly to your customers. Reduce 'where is my order' calls and build trust through proactive communication.

### Operational efficiency
Internal teams can quickly identify bottlenecks, anticipate delays, and resolve issues before they impact the customer. Improve logistics, optimize inventory flow, and enhance service levels.

### Data ownership and insights
Own all your tracking data. Analyze trends, identify common shipping issues, measure delivery performance, and gain valuable insights to continually improve your supply chain.

## Real-world applications

Custom order tracking and visibility tools are transforming various industries:

**E-commerce**: Providing customers with a branded portal to track their multi-item orders from warehouse picking to porch delivery, including internal status updates (e.g., 'Awaiting stock', 'Customizing order').

**Manufacturing**: Tracking raw materials through production, assembly, quality control, and final shipment, offering B2B clients real-time updates on their custom orders.

**Healthcare Logistics**: Monitoring sensitive medical shipments from dispatch through various temperature-controlled stages to patient delivery, ensuring compliance and critical timing.

**Field Services**: Allowing customers to track technician dispatch and arrival times for service appointments, reducing missed appointments and improving customer satisfaction.

## The Kliv advantage

Kliv demystifies custom software development:

- **Describe, don't code**: Explain your desired tracking features in plain language, and Kliv's AI helps build it.
- **Rapid deployment**: Get your custom tracking solution up and running in days or weeks, not months.
- **Scalability**: Easily add new features or integrate new carriers as your business evolves, without external dependencies.
- **Cost-effective**: A one-time investment yielding long-term control and savings compared to continuous SaaS subscriptions.

## Get started today

The most effective order tracking system is the one designed for your unique operations and customer needs. Stop compromising with generic tools and unlock the power of custom development with Kliv.

items.answer: A basic order tracking application can be functional in a few days. More complex systems with advanced integrations and features might take a week or two to fully implement and test, depending on the complexity of your existing systems.
items.question: How quickly can I build an order tracking solution?

items.answer: No deep coding expertise is required. Kliv's AI platform translates your business logic and requirements into functional software, guiding you through the process.
items.question: Do I need to be a developer to build this application?

items.answer: Yes, you can integrate your custom order tracking tool with virtually any existing system that has an API. This includes ERPs like SAP or Oracle, WMS solutions, e-commerce platforms like Shopify or Magento, and major shipping carrier APIs.
items.question: Can I connect my new tool to my existing ERP, WMS, or e-commerce platform?

items.answer: You retain full ownership of the application, its code, and all data. Kliv provides the platform to build it, but the intellectual property is entirely yours, giving you complete control and flexibility.
items.question: Who owns the data and the application I build?

items.answer: Building with Kliv is typically a one-time development investment, leading to significant cost savings compared to recurring subscription fees from SaaS providers, especially as your order volume grows. You avoid vendor lock-in and can modify the system without additional per-feature costs.
items.question: How does the cost compare to off-the-shelf tracking software?

items.answer: Absolutely. Custom tools are designed for flexibility. As your business scales or your logistics needs evolve, you can easily add new features, integrate with new partners, or modify existing tracking workflows without needing to wait for a vendor's product roadmap.
items.question: Can the application scale with my business or adapt to new logistics partners?

items.answer: You control the security of your custom application, choosing your hosting environment and security protocols. This often allows for higher levels of data privacy and compliance tailored to your specific industry regulations than shared SaaS environments.
